Description: Lower section of a green glazed composition standing figure, holding a papyriform column before, the column supports three monkeys, who squat with their hands to their mouthes, another monkey crouches behind the figure, and another stands in front of the column and is pulling the horns of a small standing quadruped.
Bibliographic references: Bulté 1991 / Talismans égyptiens d'heureuse maternité : "faïence" bleu vert à pois foncés (no.121)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
